  return var_rank == p.Rank
})
Inputs.table(filtered)

title: EXP 02 | CFS_Art
text:
Analysis

t 検定


Effect sizes were labelled following Cohen's (1988) recommendations.

The Welch Two Sample t-test testing the difference between invert and upright
(mean of x = 4.93, mean of y = 4.86) suggests that the effect is positive,
statistically not significant, and very small (difference = 0.08, 95% CI
[-0.80, 0.95], t(45.99) = 0.17, p = 0.863; Cohen's d = 0.05, 95% CI [-0.52,
0.62])
